summary: "V for Vendetta" is a 2005 action film set in a future where the UK is ruled by a totalitarian regime. A masked freedom fighter named V (Hugo Weaving) uses terrorism to fight for revolution. Evey Hammond (Natalie Portman), a young woman, joins his mission. The film follows their journey and a detective trying to stop V. Based on a comic by Alan Moore, it became popular for its political messages and made the Guy Fawkes mask a symbol of protest. Despite some criticism from Moore, the film was a box office success.
title: V for Vendetta (film)
